dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Welcome to the game! What would you like to do?

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: I've been expecting you. You seek adventure, I presume?

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: Aye! But first, tell me about this village.

dialogue.speaker: NPC
dialogue.text: This village has been plagued by a strange curse. People go missing at night...

dialogue.speaker: Player
dialogue.text: I see. And what do you think is causing the curse?
